name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CodeClimbers | The homepage for time tracking

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track the time you spend coding and improve productivity. Private, local, and open source!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Every time you open a new window, get a visual of how you're spending your time. 

A great reminder for devs to spend more time coding, and less time in the blackhole of the internet.

Makes your homepage more productive!

Additional perks: Open-source, local, and private.

Oh, and it's FREE!
